resources.string: 1. You are supposed to make as many words as you can from the given set of letters in the grid. \n2. If the submitted word is a valid one then it is added to the list and the score would be updated. \n3. The minimum valid word length is 4 i.e. "cars" is a valid word whereas "car" is not.

Hinix is a challenging word game inspired from the classic board trivia "Boggle". The app is open source at https://github.com/aviaryan/Hinix . 
 
Contributors: 
1. Avi Aryan 
2. Nilesh Chaturvedi 
3. Raju Koushik 
4. Saurabh Jain 

 
Version 2.0
